description: Validate key components and functionality of the Home Page.
name: Home Page Tests

elements.name: Validate key sections of the Home Page

steps.name: I want to open the application
the flight search section should be visible
the advanced search button should be visible
I click the flight button
the flight button action is verified
I click the hotel button
the hotel button action is verified

result.error_message:
CypressError: Timed out retrying after 30050ms: `cy.click()` failed because the page updated while this command was executing. Cypress tried to locate elements based on this query:

> <button.ng-star-inserted>

We initially found matching element(s), but while waiting for them to become actionable, they disappeared from the page. Common situations why this happens:
  - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously
  - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element

You can typically solve this by breaking up a chain. For example, rewrite:

> `cy.get('button').click().click()`

to

> `cy.get('button').as('btn').click()`
> `cy.get('@btn').click()`

steps.name: I click the sports button
the sports button action is verified
I click the package button
the package button action is verified
I switch to the "Round Trip" tab
the "Round Trip" tab should be active
I switch to the "One Way" tab
the "One Way" tab should be active
I switch to the "Multi City (3 Segment)" tab
the "Multi City (3 Segment)" tab should be active
I switch to the "Multi City" tab
the "Multi City" tab should be active
I switch to the "Round Trip" tab
the origin input should be visible
the destination input should be visible
the departure date input should be visible
the return date input should be visible
the traveler and class panel should be visible
I switch to the "One Way" tab
the origin input should be visible
the destination input should be visible
the departure date input should be visible
the traveler and class panel should be visible
I switch to the "Multi City" tab
I add a new segment
the inputs for the multi-city search should be validated
the traveler and class panel should be visible
I click on the advanced search button
the advanced search options should be validate
